item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。日元继续下滑。美国国债跌幅扩大。资金经理们连续第二周将资金投入中国资产。以下是市场动向。【原文：Good morning. The yen continues to slump. US Treasuries extend losses. Money managers plow money into Chinese assets for a second week. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 凯茜-伍德的 6000 万美元风险投资基金入股埃隆-马斯克的 xAI 公司
item.description: 凯茜-伍德（Cathie Wood）的方舟投资管理公司（Ark Investment Management）购买了埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的人工智能初创公司 xAI 的股份，这是该公司对新生的人工智能产业将给全球科技带来革命性变化的日益增长的赌注的一部分。【原文：Cathie Wood’s Ark Investment Management has purchased a stake in Elon Musk’s artificial-intelligence startup xAI, part of a growing wager that the nascent AI industry will revolutionize global tech.】

item.title: 市场综述：国债下跌后亚洲股市将走低
item.description: 在以债券抛售为主的美国交易时段之后，亚洲股市大多将下跌，交易商还将权衡喜忧参半的经济数据和美联储发言人的讲话，以寻找政策前景的线索。【原文：Stocks in Asia were mostly set to decline after a US session dominated by a sell-off in bonds, with traders also weighing mixed economic data and remarks from Federal Reserve speakers for clues on the policy outlook.】

item.title: 台湾 ETF 热潮降温，业绩和监管令投资者望而却步
item.description: 台湾交易所交易基金的需求在几个月前还很旺盛，但随着其业绩下滑和监管机构对资产类别的收紧，需求正在迅速下降。【原文：Demand for Taiwanese exchange-traded funds, which was booming just a couple of months ago, is falling fast as their performance lags and regulators tighten up on the asset class.】

item.title: 数字桥公司的彼得-霍珀将离开资产管理公司
item.description: 据知情人士透露，DigitalBridge Group Inc. 董事总经理 Peter Hopper 即将离开公司。【原文：DigitalBridge Group Inc. managing director Peter Hopper is leaving the firm, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 派博桑德勒研究显示：拜登获胜将推高美国收益率
item.description: Piper Sandler & Co.的策略师称，如果乔-拜登总统赢得今年 11 月的连任，美国 10 年期国债收益率可能上升约 12 个基点。【原文：The US 10-year Treasury yield could rise about 12 basis points if President Joe Biden wins reelection this November, according to Piper Sandler & Co. strategists.】

item.title: 因担心销售增长，塞尔希斯股价创三年来最大跌幅
item.description: Celsius Holdings Inc. 的股价创下三年多来最大跌幅，因为行业销售数据显示这家能量饮料生产商的收入增长正在降温。【原文：Celsius Holdings Inc. shares dropped by the most in more than three years after industry sales data signaled that the energy-drink maker’s revenue growth is cooling.】

item.title: 马克龙和肖尔茨承诺将资本市场的空谈变为现实
item.description: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）表示，经过多年的讨论，德国和法国已同意在深化欧盟资本市场以促进欧盟投资方面取得快速进展。【原文：Germany and France have agreed to make rapid progress to deepen the European Union’s capital markets to boost investment in the bloc after years of discussions, French President Emmanuel Macron said.】

item.title: 欧文斯科宁为美耐特交易筹集资金的债券兴趣评估
item.description: 欧文斯科宁公司正在测试投资者对债券的偏好，这些债券将有助于为其 39 亿美元收购门窗制造商 Masonite International 公司的部分交易再融资。【原文：Owens Corning is testing investor appetite for bonds that will help refinance a portion of its $3.9 billion acquisition of doormaker Masonite International Corp.】

item.title: 英伟达连续第三天大涨，盈利突破 4600 亿美元
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）股价连续第三天飙升，原因是埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）加速挑战 OpenAI，助长了人工智能热潮，延续了财报后的涨势，使这家芯片制造商的市值增加了约 4600 亿美元。【原文：Nvidia Corp. shares are surging for a third day as Elon Musk fueled the artificial-intelligence frenzy by accelerating his challenge of OpenAI, extending a post-earnings rally that’s added some $460 billion to the chipmaker’s market capitalization.】

item.title: 拥抱比特币财政战略，Semler Scientific 股价上涨
item.description: 医疗设备制造商森勒科学公司（Semler Scientific Inc.【原文：Medical device maker Semler Scientific Inc. said it has adopted Bitcoin as its primary treasury reserve asset, becoming one of the few public companies to follow the controversial approach pioneered by MicroStrategy Inc.】

item.title: 并购融资渠道缩减，促进信贷发展
item.description: 与几个月前相比，现在公司在长期债务市场上需要再融资的并购案减少了，这可能有助于提高今年的债券回报率。【原文：Companies have fewer acquisitions to refinance in longer-term debt markets now than they did a few months ago, which could help boost bond returns this year.】

item.title: Darktrace 即将重返英国富时 100 指数
item.description: 在收购要约刺激网络安全公司股价大涨之后，Darktrace Plc有望重新加入英国蓝筹股指数。【原文：Darktrace Plc is on track to rejoin the UK’s blue-chip equity index after a takeover bid spurred a rally in shares of the cybersecurity firm.】

item.title: 债券市场出现至少自 2013 年以来最大的债券销售热潮
item.description: 美国各州和地方政府没有被高利率吓倒，推动市政债券市场迎来了至少自 2013 年以来最繁忙的一年。【原文：US states and local governments, undeterred by high interest rates, have propelled the municipal bond market to the busiest start to a year since at least 2013.】

item.title: 西门子能源考虑在 Gamesa 风电部门裁员 4100 人
item.description: 西门子能源股份公司（Siemens Energy AG）正在考虑裁减其陷入困境的 Gamesa 风力涡轮机部门的 4100 个工作岗位，据熟悉相关讨论的人士透露，该公司正在与劳工代表就结构调整问题进行谈判。【原文：Siemens Energy AG is weighing cutting 4,100 jobs at its troubled Gamesa wind turbine unit as the company enters talks with labor representatives on structural changes, according to people familiar with the discussions.】

item.title: 随着时间的流逝，必和必拓与盎格鲁集团在南非问题上仍存在分歧
item.description: 在剩下不到一天的时间里，必和必拓集团和英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）的顾问们仍在努力寻找突破口，以挽救必和必拓雄心勃勃的 490 亿美元收购计划。【原文：With less than one day left on the clock, advisers for BHP Group and Anglo American Plc were still struggling to find a breakthrough to salvage BHP’s ambitious $49 billion takeover plan.】

item.title: 伊拉克库尔德地区的石油公司发出愿意谈判的信号
item.description: 在伊拉克库尔德地区运营的国际石油公司表示，他们愿意与联邦政府和地区当局就合同条款进行谈判，以期重启停滞了一年多的出口。【原文：International oil companies operating in Iraq’s Kurdish region say they are willing to negotiate contract terms with both federal government and regional authorities in a bid to restart exports that have been stalled for more than a year.】

item.title: 芝加哥犯罪事件促使中粮集团计划迁往郊区
item.description: 据知情人士透露，中国最大食品公司的贸易部门中粮国际有限公司（Cofco International Ltd.）将把芝加哥市中心的办事处迁往郊区，部分原因是犯罪活动持续不断。【原文：Cofco International Ltd., the trading arm of China’s largest food company, will relocate its downtown Chicago office to the suburbs in part due to persistent crime, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 德国希望欧盟推动终止最后 20% 的俄罗斯能源进口
item.description: 在本周于布鲁塞尔召开的部长会议之前，德国呼吁欧盟采取更多措施，遏制仍在向欧盟海岸进口的最后 20% 的俄罗斯能源。【原文：Germany is calling for the European Union to do more to curtail the last 20% of Russian energy imports still coming to the bloc’s shores ahead of a meeting of ministers in Brussels this week.】

item.title: 前先锋公司首席执行官称美国联邦贸易委员会在埃克森交易中错误地诋毁了他
item.description: 前先锋自然资源公司（Pioneer Natural Resources Co.首席执行官斯科特-谢菲尔德（Scott Sheffield）说，联邦监管机构错误地描述了事实，并错误地诋毁他，说他试图与欧佩克（OPEC）勾结以抬高原油价格。【原文：Former Pioneer Natural Resources Co. Chief Executive Officer Scott Sheffield says federal regulators mischaracterized facts and wrongly vilified him in saying he tried to collude with OPEC to prop up crude prices.】

item.title: 丰业银行称加拿大降息需数月才能帮助消费者
item.description: 新斯科舍银行（Bank of Nova Scotia）的一位高管表示，虽然降低借贷成本的预期正在形成，但对于银行客户来说，降息 "真正见效 "还需要长达三个季度的时间。【原文：While expectations for lower borrowing costs are building, it will take as long as three quarters for interest-rate cuts “to really bear fruit” for bank customers, according to a Bank of Nova Scotia executive.】

item.title: 股东反弹后，Boohoo 取消高管奖金计划
item.description: 在线时尚零售商 Boohoo Group Plc 取消了一项丰厚的高管奖金计划，原因是有报道称在亏损膨胀后，该计划遭到了股东的反弹。【原文：Online fashion retailer Boohoo Group Plc scrapped a lucrative bonus plan for executives amid reports of a shareholder backlash following ballooning losses.】

item.title: 欧盟即将就倒闭贷款人达成协议，迈向更紧密的银行业关系之路
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，欧盟即将就一些措施达成协议，这些措施将使陷入困境的小型贷款机构更容易清盘。【原文：The European Union is nearing a deal on measures that would make it easier to wind down smaller lenders that run into trouble, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 阿根廷最富裕地区的债券持有人质疑米莱的决心
item.description: 布宜诺斯艾利斯省的债券持有人猜测，即使是挥舞着电锯的阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱伊（Javier Milei）也不会无情到让这个阿根廷最富裕的地区破产。【原文：Bondholders in the Province of Buenos Aires are speculating that even Argentina’s chainsaw wielding President Javier Milei isn’t ruthless enough to let the nation’s richest region go bankrupt.】

item.title: 日元兑英镑汇率跌至近 16 年来最低点
item.description: 日元兑英镑汇率跌至近16年来的最弱水平，再次引发了人们对货币贬值的担忧，这种担忧今年一直困扰着政策制定者。【原文：The yen slumped to its weakest level in almost 16 years against the British pound, renewing concern over a currency depreciation that has dogged policymakers this year.】

item.title: 加拿大帝国商业银行（CIBC）从巴克莱银行（Barclays）收购阿斯顿，推进美国杠杆融资业务
item.description: 加拿大帝国商业银行（Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce）从巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）聘请了资深银行家布拉德-阿斯顿（Brad Aston）负责资本市场业务，从而扩大了其在杠杆融资领域的覆盖范围。【原文：Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce is bulking up its coverage in leveraged finance, hiring veteran banker Brad Aston from Barclays Plc for its capital-markets business.】
